data.title: Why, in almost every Western movie, does the horse never get shot?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 7): Okay from a Realistic point of view, being shot does not jerk you about as they do it on western movies or Tv, you will only get jerked like that if it was a really big caliber bullet.
